item.title: From Growler to Gib: Jaguar Struck by Bud Lightning
item.description: The week of November 18, 2024: Jaguar’s “Drunken Dream,” the debt, antitrust, labor, and more.

item.title: The Collapse of Anti-Trump Lawfare
item.description: A judge has granted Jack Smith’s request to dismiss the 2020 election-interference case against Trump.

item.title: Stop Calling Them ‘Student Loans’
item.description: If the lender expects to lose money, that’s not a loan. It’s a handout.

item.title: Nancy Mace-Style Theatrics Won’t Serve the GOP Well
item.description: Republicans should heed the lessons of Democrats’ overreach on the trans issue.

item.title: Georgetown Somehow Deemed Accommodations for Pregnant Students ‘Inequitable’
item.description: A pregnant woman was denied accommodations at Georgetown Law, a Catholic university. Students fought back.
